promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive mythical ostrich electric-type wearing a yellow and black crown. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or electric. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Torryn, a massive mythical ostrich electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: bolt-beak. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word ostrich or electric or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, ostrich-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Torryn is a majestic pokemon that soars over mountaintops. It hunts with a powerful beak of electric energy, never tiring.
